name: Jungle tumble
description:
Info:

This was made for a LSBU  game jam. The theme was 'Accessibility' with the restriction of only one button. Our team created a game about a monkey tumbling through the jungle.

The monkey will run automatically and change direction when they bump into a wall/the edge of the screen. Press to jump, hold to swing on a vine and release to leap off a vine.

The game functions using the space bar or a control pad.
